rev.diff:
Line 58: Line 58:
===Captchas===
===Captchas===
  +
[[Image:RapidShare cat CAPTCHA.png|thumb|right|200px|An example of a CAPTCHA]]
The site's [[CAPTCHA]] codes have been made increasingly difficult. As of {{date|April 25, 2008}}, CAPTCHAs are displayed as 8 warped alphanumeric characters, each with a dog or a cat printed over them; the user then is instructed to type in the 4 letters with the cat on them. The site allows some leeway in terms of entering the code: similarly shaped characters can be entered interchangeably, such as the letter <code>O</code> and the number <code>0</code>.
The site's [[CAPTCHA]] codes have been made increasingly difficult. As of {{date|April 25, 2008}}, CAPTCHAs are displayed as 8 warped alphanumeric characters, each with a dog or a cat printed over them; the user then is instructed to type in the 4 letters with the cat on them. The site allows some leeway in terms of entering the code: similarly shaped characters can be entered interchangeably, such as the letter <code>O</code> and the number <code>0</code>.
